alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 1:12AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Somerset, southwestern Wicomico and central Dorchester Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 112 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Patuxent River Naval Air Station, or near Lexington Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vienna, Whitehaven, Green Hill, Wetipquin, Oriole, Andrews, Royal Oak, Crocheron, Honga, Dames Quarter, Wingate, Widgeon, Mount Vernon, Nanticoke, Monie, Bucktown and Bivalve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.
